chapter.title: First steps
chapter.para: Webcampak is provide with two separate interfaces:

listitem.para: viewer panel: to browse within pictures and videos
administration panel: to configure Webcampak and its sources.

chapter.para: A user management system will let you choose which user can access which part of Webcampak.
To access Webcampak for the first time, open your web browser and connect to: http://Webcampak-IP-address, replacing "Webcampak-IP-address" by the actual Webcampak IP.

important.para: Please change the password as soon as possible.
